qas.question: What patent does Technicolor claim to control?
What are Technicolor constantly in the process of doing?

context: Technicolor (formerly called <a0_0>Thomson Consumer Electronics<a0_0/>) claims to control MP3 licensing of the <a1_0>Layer 3<a1_0/> patents in many countries, including the United States, Japan, Canada and EU countries. Technicolor has been <a2_0>actively enforcing these patents<a2_0/>.
